text:
Created attachment 32777
This scene jmx.

This happens when my test is the http sampler, thread group contains 100 threads, duration is 30 seconds, url is 'www.baidu.com'. Then run the test plan. At the end of, a part of threads does not exit. The http status always stay in ESTABLISHED.

jmeter.bat:
set HEAP=-Xms512m -Xmx4096m

PS: If I change the http to https, the problem does not exit.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Ensure you use connect and response timeout.
Please ask before on user mailing list.

creator: 350948908@qq.com
text:
Created attachment 32787
usermanual

In the usermanual，I found connect and response timeout is not required, why I must to set it to resolve this problem? I guess this problem cause by http connection does not closed in a correctly way.
